title: Luc(as) de groot
content:
hi,   
I'm a typography student at Bezalel academy of art and design. I'm despretly looking for any info/hints about a dutch tyopeface designer named Lucas De Groot. especialy any printed works by him (books/magazines whatever...).   
so if anybody can help me... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023143729im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
Roy
author: anonymous

comments.content:
thanx for your quick respond ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023143729im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
the truth is that i have tryed to contact him. i found out that he gave a lecture at fuse 94 named

Luc[as] is as friendly as he is talented and skilled - so just try emailing him:   
 [http://www.lucasfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023143729/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/)   
   
hhp
